N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 814.3 - Eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Applications
for assistance under this Part may be made only by two or more municipalities
which jointly submit requests on forms established by the secretary. (b) Grants may be used to cover legal and
consultant services, feasibility studies, capital improvements and other
necessary expenses related to costs associated with mergers, consolidations, cooperative agreements, dissolutions and shared services by
municipalities. Notes
